pages.news: Latest Educational Trends & News at Scholarly - Stay Updated with New School Supplies & Learning Resources! Home About Services News Contact Home About Services News Contact Welcome to Scholarly Dive into a world of endless learning opportunities with our wide selection of school supplies and educational resources. Discover everything you need for a successful academic journey. Explore Scholarly At Scholarly, we are dedicated to enriching the educational journey of students with a comprehensive selection of school supplies, from the basic essentials to advanced learning tools. Our offerings cater to all educational levels, ensuring every student has access to the resources they need for academic success. Committed to sustainability, Scholarly proudly participates in eco-friendly initiatives and promotes a culture of recycling and environmental education. Our location advantages allow us to collaborate closely with local businesses, educational institutions, and cultural organizations, providing unique learning materials and opportunities that extend beyond the classroom. pages.privacy: Your Privacy Matters at Scholarly - Read Our Privacy Policy to Understand How We Protect Your Information Home About Services News Contact Home About Services News Contact Privacy Policy At Scholarly, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the handling of information on our website. No Collection of Personal Information Scholarly does not collect any personal information from its users. Visitors are free to browse our website without the worry of data collection, as we do not gather or store any personal details, including names, email addresses, or any other identifiable information. No Cookies We do not use cookies on our website. There is no tracking or storing of information about your visit to our site for any purpose. External Links Our website may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies. Changes to Our Privacy Policy Scholarly reserves the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of our website following any changes indicates your acceptance of the new Privacy Policy. No Tracking or Analytics We do not employ any tracking or analytics tools on our website. Your browsing activity remains completely private and unmonitored by us. Security Measures Although we do not collect personal information, we are committed to ensuring the security of our website. We take appropriate measures to protect our site from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction of potential data. No Sharing of Information Since we do not collect any personal information, there is no information to share or sell to third parties. Your visit to our site remains confidential. Voluntary Contact If you choose to contact us through email, we will only use your email address to respond to your query. We do not store your email address or any other personal information after the communication is complete. Children's Privacy Our website is not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly engage in any activity that would require parental consent under children's privacy laws. Your Consent By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms. If you do not agree with our policy, please do not use our website. Contact Us If you have any questions about our privacy practices or this Privacy Policy, please contact us at scholarly@gmail.com. Scholarly About Us Services Products News & Events Contact Us Resources Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Follow Us Bangalore, Karnataka +91-022-8511930 scholarly@gmail.com © 2024 Scholarly, All Rights Reserved
pages.terms: Terms of Use at Scholarly: Understanding Your Rights & Responsibilities for a Better Shopping Experience Home About Services News Contact Home About Services News Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to Scholarly! By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth below. If you do not agree with any part of these terms and conditions, please do not use our website or services. Use of Site The content and products on Scholarly are provided for your personal, non-commercial use only. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or display the content without our prior written consent. User Conduct Users are expected to use Scholarly respectfully and legally. Any form of harassment, fraud, or infringement of intellectual property rights is strictly prohibited. Purchase and Payment When you make a purchase on Scholarly, you agree to provide a valid payment method. Prices and availability of products are subject to change without notice. Returns and Refunds If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return it within a specified period for a refund or exchange, subject to our returns policy. Privacy Policy Please refer to our Privacy Policy page to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Changes to Terms and Conditions We reserve the right to make changes to these terms and conditions at any time. Your continued use of the site following any changes means that you accept and agree to the changes. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at scholarly@gmail.com.
